item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossy)】M4A - Taylor Swift - The Eras Tour Film (MovieTheater Recording)
item.description:
so, I went to my local movie theater yesterday, to enjoy this masterpiece,
and to my surprise (not really), I had the full room for my own enjoyment and company

instead of screaming my heart out, sharing friendship bracelets
and dancing my feet off with other swifties (like I dreamed I would)
I found myself recording the audio of the full concert film to share it with you all!

it was nice, really. I couldn't stop myself from (silently) crying when she played YOYOK
it felt like having my own private concert

I am not an audio engineer or something, and this was recorded with my iPhone,
so don't expect HQ audio. I tried my best, tho
at times, at certain songs, the audio feels a little muffled

I'm hoping this will be officially released within the following weeks
for the time being... this is the best I could do

please, comment/reply with the one song you would have loved
to be included on the setlist!

thanks, guys!

item.author: zorualol
